publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-173.1 Donald Gorrie: Ending Alcohol Ban at Sports Grounds—As an amendment to motion (S2M-173) in the name of David McLetchie, insert at end "and that, as a trial of this policy, the ban should be lifted for two years at Murrayfield and at two or three football grounds, with a final decision being made after an evaluation of the trial."

S2M-173.1 Donald Gorrie: Ending Alcohol Ban at Sports Grounds—As an amendment to motion (S2M-173) in the name of David McLetchie, insert at end "and that, as a trial of this policy, the ban should be lifted for two years at Murrayfield and at two or three football grounds, with a final decision being made after an evaluation of the trial."
S2M-173.1 Ending Alcohol Ban at Sports Grounds (lodged on 23 June 2003) Mike Pringle*
